text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: A good morning to you, trainer!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I can't begin to tell you how excited I am to start my new training life…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I've been running for 8 hours already! In the dream I had!!
choice_data_list: You mean you came well rested!
You mean you came well rested!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yessir! Of course!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Aah, I can't wait to tell father and mother! How I, Bakushin O…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Have decisively won the Arima Kinen, Japan Cup, Tenno Sho, Takarazuka Kinen, Kikka Sho, Japan Derby…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And have fulfilled my duty as the shining example, the class president, to each and every horsegirl……!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Right then! I'm looking forward to our first training this afternoon!
… She's gonna need a lot of skills to win all the GIs she just rambled off.
But what she really needs is…
And so—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Right, trainer, give me your instructions! Instructions worthy of an exemplary class president!
I handed an enthusiastic Sakura Bakushin O the training menu for today.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmhmm… first thing up's footwork on the ladder! A perfect warm-up indeed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'll have it done in three minutes! Onwaaards!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hah… haa… one down! Let's see, next up is… practice starts! Yessir, I'm on it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: On my marks… ready…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Onwaaaards!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Haah… haah… phew～! I'm feeling the warm and the up!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's high time to move to the main training then! As I recall, it starts with an all-out dash interval run…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hmm? …Hmmhmmmhmmmhmm!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: What isn't!? This, this menu…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This is a training menu… for short distances!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This can't be right, trainer! Did I not tell you I don't intend to be a sprinter!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And you told me we would win every kind of race!? But this—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I-I'm taking it easy! Easy as can be!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But trainer, this training is too focused on short-distances!! Would longer distances not require a menu centered around paced—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: P-pres…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Phew… my excuses!! I, for just one moment, may have lost a liiittle bit of composure!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Right then, the calm and collected class president will hear you out, so please explain it to me!
choice_data_list: Remember the key to winning races?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: None other than speed, of course!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Speed into the lead, always closer to the finish than any other horsegirl! The road to victory is sure to open up for you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Indeed, speed is the key factor in becoming the strongest horsegirl!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I… I see…! This too is a step towards becoming a model class president…! So that was your intention all along…!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Come to think of it, you did say that you would lead me to the pinnacle of every GI on speed alone…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer… you understood me perfectly from the start!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: If you say so, then I will follow! That's what I've just decided!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well then, I'll be on my way, back to training!! Bakushin bakushiiiiiin!!
In this vein, many days were spent with Sakura Baksuhin O, further polishing her speed. Eventually—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Onwaaaards!
(Wooooooaaaaaaah!!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: She shoots out in front, Sakura Bakushin O! Wasting no time getting to top speed!! Bakushin O with impressive acceleration!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin bakushin bakushiiiin!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: She held her lead the whole way to the finish line!! Her overwhelming speed is drawing cheers from the crowd!!
(Woooooooaaaaaaaah!!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Aahahaha! Behold, the class president!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The winner of this 1200m dirt race, on her debut! Sakura Bakushin O!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: —Trainer!! Read as "first place" and pronounced "class president", that's me, Sakura Bakushin O!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hehehe… I put my trust in you, so I won't question why I'm debuting at a short distance race!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This must just be a preliminary race!! I'm pretty sure about that!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Let's go for it, trainer!! One bakushin on the class president's way to all the G1 trophies!!
That's right… as she said, let's just go ahead and "bakushin" our way.
If she continues to refine her speed, she will… eventually… The possibility is there… somewhere!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin bakushiin to the fuuuuture!!!
